item.title: Need help with adding thieving!
item.dc:creator: @Bubbsy7 Bubbsy7
item.description:
@Bubbsy7 wrote:

Right under were my object training is, I’m using an old fashion mopar server so it’s object training…Heres what it looks like:

[code]case 411:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You Get, What’s This??? Cash!”);
sendMessage(“And Mage And Pray XP OMFG”);
addItem(995, 10000);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(2555);
addSkillXP((1000playerLevel[5]), 5);
addSkillXP((1000playerLevel[6]), 6);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

case 2465:
addSkillXP((1000playerLevel[6]), 6);
addSkillXP((100playerLevel[3]), 3);
sendMessage(“YOU GET SOME MAGE EXP!!”);
break;
case 2513:
if(actionTimer == 0) { //range
sendMessage(“You shoot at the target and get some range exp.”);
actionName = “range1”;
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(426);
addSkillXP((250*playerLevel[4]), 4);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

case 2873:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You train Attack!”);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(2068);
addSkillXP((300playerLevel[0]), 0);
addSkillXP((3000playerLevel[3]), 3);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

case 2874:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You train Str!”);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(2555);
addSkillXP((250playerLevel[2]), 2);
addSkillXP((400playerLevel[3]), 3);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

case 4878:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You steal from the stall!”);
addItem(995, 2500);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(1978);
addSkillXP((250playerLevel[3]), 3);
addSkillXP((100playerLevel[1]), 1);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

case 2875:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You train Def!”);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(1978);
addSkillXP((250playerLevel[3]), 3);
addSkillXP((100playerLevel[1]), 1);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

case 2514:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You train range!”);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(2068);
addSkillXP((150playerLevel[4]), 0);
addSkillXP((300playerLevel[3]), 3);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

case 2677:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You train your HP !”);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(423);
addSkillXP((600*playerLevel[3]), 3);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

case 8972: // kalphite zone
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You teled to the Kalphite Zone , Carefull !”);
teleportToX = 3487;
teleportToY = 9493;
heightLevel = 0;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;[/code]

theirs more but theirs where i added it…

item.title: Need help with adding thieving!
item.dc:creator: @Bubbsy7 Bubbsy7
item.description:
@Bubbsy7 wrote:

Ok so heres what I did:

case 4878: if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You steal from the stall!"); addItem(995, 2500); actionTimer = 53; setAnimation(1978); addSkillXP((250*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[1]), 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

I know i still have to edit the animation and what xp it gives out, but when i click on the stall nothing happens… HELP PLEASE!!

Read full topic
